note.p: Career: Under Secretary for the Colonies (1780); Lieutenant-Colonel of the King's American Dragoons (1780); in service of the Elector of Bavaria (1784-1795); founded the Royal Institution (1799)
References: C Harrison Dwight, 'Count Rumford' in NR 1954-55 vol 11 pp 189-201, plate
Sir John Meurig Thomas, 'Sir Benjamin Thompson, Count Rumford and the Royal Institution' in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 11-25, plate
R V J, review of Gwendy Caroe, The Royal Institution: An Informal History in NR 1986-87 vol 41 pp 107-110
R V Jones, 'Benjamin Franklin' in NR 1976-7 vol 31 pp 201-225
G N Cantor, 'Thomas Young's Lectures at the Royal Institution' in NR 1970 vol 25 pp 87-112
